info.name: Transcoder
info.description: Transcode uploaded videos to fit within file size limit

defaultConfig.name: Fix extension type
defaultConfig.note: Fix video file extensions to ensure embed

defaultConfig.name: Always Compress images
defaultConfig.note: Any uploaded images will be compressed to webp, otherwise only compress images that exceed file upload size

defaultConfig.name: Two pass encode
defaultConfig.note: Whether to use two pass encoding. Doubles encode time but does improve compression

defaultConfig.name: Max fps
defaultConfig.note: Limit the videos fps to improve compression

defaultConfig.name: Max Width
defaultConfig.note: Scale down videos to this width to save on size, maintains aspect ratio. Leave blank to turn this off

defaultConfig.name: Max Height
defaultConfig.note: Scale down videos to this height to save on size, maintains aspect ratio. Leave blank to turn this off

defaultConfig.name: Target size
defaultConfig.note: File size to target compression for in MB, this is capped by whatever your max file upload size is normal: 8MB, Nitro: 100MB

defaultConfig.name: Overhead multiplier
defaultConfig.note: Scaling factor to accomodate the file overhead for the compression

defaultConfig.name: Minimum bitrate (kbps)
defaultConfig.note: Lowest bitrate compression will be allowed to go, will start to limit time to ensure the bitrate is kept for the size

defaultConfig.name: Maximum bitrate (kbps)
defaultConfig.note: Maximum bitrate to not waste time trying to encode for an insane quality
